modName: Reapers  Nord Hunters Armor CBBE v3
summary: This is a HIGH RES. Retexture of the Savior\'s Hide, Steel Boots & Gauntlets to look like Light Steel with White Fur & Black Leather. Forgeable at any Forge under Steel, Armor is for Both Male & Female (cbbe v3)
descriptionHtml:
Mod Name: Reaper\'s Hunter\'s Armor (CBBE v3)
By: Reaper9111
Version: 1


Description
===========

<<<There\'s an Updated .esp of this mod witch allow you to upgade the armor... Thanks to Saaya !
Advailable here :   http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19354   >>>

This mod add to any forge in the steel section an unenchanted armor called Hunter\'s Armor...
It\'s stats are the same as the nordic steel armor...
You will find a retextured Savior\'s Hide as the main body, Nordic steel Boots and Gauntlets retextured as well to make a nice set !
I did not include any helmet since i\'m not using any...
The armor is easyly accesible at the start of the game since all you need to create it at the forge is the steel perk, 
some steel ingot, wolf pelt, leather and leather stripes...
They are not Upgradeble ! (I did this mod to simply have a cool looking armor on my character when i start a new game !)
The armor is working with CBBE v3 Female Body ! The Armor is for Both male and female !

Required mods
=============
None.


Install
=======
Install using Nexus Mod Manager (NMM)
-------------------------------------
1. Download the file from Nexus
2. Select the file in the Mods tab of NMM, and click on the \"Activates the selected mod\" button.


Manual install
==============
1. Extract the files of this mod to a temporary location (you can use 7zip: http://www.7-zip.org, to unzip them) and chek the folder structure.
2. Copy to (install folder)\\Skyrim\\Data\\:
.- the Meshes folder
.- the Textures folder
.- the .esp if there is one in the mod.
If asked if you want to overwrite existing files say \"Yes to all\".  


Upgrade
=======
Not aplicable at this time.


Uninstall
=========
Uninstall using Nexus Mod Manager (NMM)
-------------------------------------
1. Select the file in the Mods tab of NMM, and click on the \"Deactivates the selected mod\" button.


Manual uninstall
================
1. Delete:
.- the folder \\meshes\\that you have previously installed.
.- the folder \\Textures\\that you have previously installed.
.- the .esp if there is one in the mod.

Incompatibility
===============
None


Known Issues or Bugs
====================
None


Future plans
============
Depending on request, i might include an helmet, and make it upgradeble !


Contact
=======
You can find me on Nexus as: Reaper9111 
You can email me *IF* i don\'t reply to your message on Nexus: reaper91_11@hotmail.com


Credits

Licensing/Legal
===============

Contact me for anything directly related to this mod.
Remember to ENDORSE the mod if you like it !
author: Reaper9111
